tool_description: Analyzes financial indicators including stock holdings, business ownership, real estate values, and public compensation data to assess prospect wealth levels.

prospect_ids.description: List of prospect identifiers to screen

screening_depth.description: Level of screening detail: basic, standard, or comprehensive

include_business_assets.description: Whether to include business ownership and valuations

include_stock_holdings.description: Whether to analyze public stock holdings and insider transactions

include_real_estate.description: Whether to include real estate property valuations

wealth_percentile_minimum.description: Minimum wealth percentile to include in results (1-99)

error_messages: Invalid prospect IDs: Provide valid prospect identifiers from previous searches.
Wealth percentile out of range: Value must be between 1 and 99.
Too many prospects: Maximum 100 prospects can be screened at once.
Screening service unavailable: External wealth screening services are temporarily unavailable.
usage: Provide prospect_ids and screening_depth to analyze wealth indicators. Use boolean parameters to control which asset types to include and set wealth_percentile_minimum to filter results.

screened_prospects.description: List of prospect IDs that completed screening

wealth_scores.description: Wealth percentile scores for each screened prospect

estimated_net_worth.description: Estimated net worth in USD for each prospect

screening_summary.description: Summary of screening results and methodology
